item.title: Dota 2: Puck Position 2 Build Guide
item.description:
Matching up against the true master of Puck, the Faerie Dragon, is one of the scariest experiences in Dota 2 . With multiple escape tools at its disposal, along with massive burst damage from its abilities, a skilled Puck player can dominate the game from the laning phase to the moment the opponent's Ancient is destroyed.

However, Puck is also one of the most challenging heroes in Dota 2 to learn, let alone master. While the hero's item build is relatively straightforward, truly mastering Puck requires time, patience, and a lot of practice. In this build guide, we'll outline the optimal ability order and item progression to help you learn the hero the right way.

Dota 2 Puck Hero Overview

Puck is a ranged Intelligence hero with a complexity rating of two stars in Dota 2 . The hero starts with decent primary stats, but its exceptionally low base Strength and Strength gain make it an easy target to kill. However, the mobility spells at its disposal offset this weakness, allowing Puck to evade threats and stay alive in fights.

Standard Abilities & Ultimate

Ability Name

How it Works

Illusory Orb

Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along its path.

Waning Rift

Puck teleports to the target location, dealing damage to enemies in a small AOE, pushing them away and silencing them for a duration.

Phase Shift

A channeled ability that shifts Puck into an alternative dimension where he can't be targeted or attacked.

Ethereal Jaunt

Only available when an Illusory Orb is flying. Allows Puck to instantly teleport to the Orb at any moment during its flight.

Dream Coil

Leashes enemies in an AOE and damages them. If the enemy breaks the leash by moving away, they are stunned and take massive damage.

Additionally, Patch 7.36, aka the Crownfall update, introduced an Innate Ability and two Facets for the hero to choose from at the start of the game:

  • Innate Ability (Puckish): Puck restores a bit of health and mana anytime it disjoints an attack or spell projectile.
  • Facet 1 (Jostling Rift): Waning Rift can be set to Alt-Cast, pulling enemies towards the center of its AoE.
  • Facet 2 (Curveball) : Illusory Orb becomes a vector-targeted spell that can be curved in any direction. Its travel speed and duration are also increased.

The health and mana restored from Puckish is higher when you manage to disjoint a spell projectile.

Puck also gains upgrades for its abilities after purchasing the Aghanim's Shard and Aghanim's Scepter:

  • Aghanim's Shard: Upgrades Phase Shift, allowing Puck to attack all enemies within its attack range each time the ability is used. It also grants bonus magic damage to Puck's auto-attacks.
  • Aghanim's Scepter: Upgrades Puck's ultimate ability, Dream Coil. Enemies caught by Dream Coil are automatically attacked by Puck.

Aghanim's Scepter Dream Coil keeps damaging the enemy heroes even if they break the coil.

Best Puck Build in Dota 2

There are two ways to play Puck in Dota 2 : as a physical damage-dealer, or a caster that relies on his spells. While both builds are good, in the high MMR bracket, most players tend to favor the caster build. This build focuses on building items that allow Puck to survive in fights and use his abilities to deal massive damage to the enemy heroes.

For this guide, we will focus on the caster build, as it utilizes Puck's abilities to its fullest extent. Puck's biggest strength is his elusiveness. With this build, you'll be playing from a distance and using your spells to contribute to the teamfight. You can also commit to killing the opponent backline if you find the right opportunity.

Puck usually plays as the Position 2 midlaner of the team.

Facets, Talents, & Ability Order

Most Puck players opt to go with the Jostling Rift Facet when playing Puck. It adds an extra bit of catch to the hero's toolkit. Since Waning Rift has a low cooldown on its own, you can use it multiple times during a chase to keep the enemy from running away. Besides, you can still turn off Auto-Cast to push enemies and break coils.

As for his abilities, Puck usually focuses on maxing out its two nukes early on during the laning phase. The first ability you'll take for the lane is Illusory Orb. It lets you harass your lane opponent from a safe distance and shove out the creep wave under the tower. You can put a value point in Phase Shift if you're up against a nuker like Lina to dodge some of her spells. Alternate between Phase Shift and Waning Rift and put a point in your ultimate when you hit level 6.

For Puck's Talents, we recommend the following:

  • Level 10: +40 Illusory Orb Damage
  • Level 15: +60 Waning Rift Damage
  • Level 20: -3s Waning Rift Cooldown
  • Level 25: Dream Coil Pierces Debuff Immunity.

Item Progression

Puck is one of those heroes who doesn't like to build damage items, especially when playing as a spellcaster. You'll want to work towards mobility items so that you can survive the teamfights while consistently spamming your abilities to create chaos in the enemy ranks. Here are the items that work well on the hero.

Starting Items

Since you're playing as the solo mid, you don't need to focus as much on regen as a safe lane carry. A set of Tango, one Faerie Fire, and four Iron Branches should be all you need to secure the last hits on the lane without dying until you get your Bottle. You'll also want an Observer Ward on the rune spot to scout gank attempts from the enemy team.

Early Game

As a midlaner, your first two waves of creeps are extremely important. Use your spells to harass the lane opponent while securing the last hit to buy your Bottle . Once you have your Bottle, make sure you pick up the Water and Bounty Runes to ensure a steady source of regen in the laning stage.

After your Bottle, buy a Null Talisman for some stats, a Magic Wand for an extra bit of sustain, and Boots of Speed. Upgrade the Boots of Speed to Power Tread as soon as you manage to save up enough Gold for it.

Core Items

The biggest power spike for Puck in the early game is when you manage to buy the Witch Blade . This item increases your projectile speed and also gives you an extra DOT (Damage Over Time) attack to help kill enemy heroes on the map. If your other lanes are doing well, focus on farming until you get your hands on the item.

After that's done, you can start playing a bit more actively. Rotate to your side lanes and help your Offlaner secure kills on the enemy core. The next item to go for is the Blink Dagger . This will serve as your primary initiation tool. Aghanim's Shard comes next, adding more damage to your arsenal.

Situational Items

Dota 2 is an extremely dynamic MOBA where every matchup can affect your item choice and decision. After picking up your core items, you'll want to take a moment to consider what you'll need to be more effective during fights. If the enemy team has too many disables for you to play around, go with Black King Bar . Against one or two silences, however, Eul's Scepter of Divinity should suffice. You can even upgrade it to Wind Waker in the late game. When you're playing against a strong initiator like Storm Spirit, it's better to go with a Linken's Sphere to disjoint the first instance of disable.

In certain matchups, you can even consider going with Aeon Disk if you're having trouble staying alive.

If you'd rather buy aggressive items, you've got a few good options. Upgrading your Witch Blade to Parasma is an excellent way to maximize your inventory space while adding more damage potential. Aghanim's Scepter is also a fantastic pickup for Puck to upgrade the Dream Coil.

You can also go with Octarine Core to lower your spell cooldowns so that you can cast more spells during fights.

Mastering Puck requires a solid understanding of when to engage with your spells and when to back off. Due to the hero's low Health Pool and weak Strength Gain, a single well-placed stun can easily send you back to the fountain awaiting your respawn. However, with the right positioning, quick reflexes, and well-timed spell casting, Puck can become an untouchable menace in Dota 2 , capable of carrying entire teamfights on its own.

item.title: 10 Best Cars In Need For Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Dodge Viper SRT10: Power & acceleration come at the cost of challenging handling. Winning races in mid-game is feasible, but struggles in Hot Pursuit events.
  • Lamborghini Gallardo: Skilled drivers appreciate its rear-wheel drive for precision. Offers control over the road beyond speed & acceleration.
  • Gumpert Apollo S: High speeds and precise cornering make it rewarding for drivers. Aerodynamics ensure control on the asphalt at all times.

Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit Remastered brings back high-octane racing and the clash between cop and racer in a visually stunning package. The game features an impressive roster of 75+ supercars, but some of them stand out for their unmatched performance and ability to dominate the road.

Whether it's tearing through highways or taking corners with precision and speed, choosing the right car can make all the difference. The following is a list of the best cars in Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered that stand out for their sheer power, handling, and owning the asphalt, making them a must-have pick for any reckless racer or law-enforcing cop.

10 Dodge Viper SRT10 Final Edition

Raw Power & Acceleration, But Challenging Handling

  • Top Speed : 206 mph (325 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 4.0 seconds
  • Car Type : Muscle

The Dodge Viper SRT10 Final Edition is a powerful American muscle car that boasts aggressive acceleration and rewards drivers who aren't daunted by its difficult handling. The Viper SRT10 Final Edition shines on straight roads, but struggles around tight corners .

For players who are still in the early to mid-game, the Viper SRT10 Final Edition can help win several races. Hiowever, its limitations become apparent in apex Hot Pursuit events with cops on the player's tail.

9 Lamborghini Gallardo LP 550-2 Valentino Balboni

Fun Rear-Wheel Drive For Skilled Drivers

  • Top Speed : 199 mph (320 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.9 seconds
  • Car Type : Supercar

This Lamborghini is a striking car for those who admire fast, clean, and focused driving. Named after the legendary test driver of the first Lamborghini, this Gallardo LP 550-2 embraces the rear-wheel setup, offering a challenging yet engaging driving experience.

If players want to make every corner or pass feel like a victory, the Gallardo LP 550-2 is their go-to companion on the road. This car is an excellent choice for players who desire complete control over the road, instead of relying on top speed and acceleration.

8 Gumpert Apollo S

Super Fast Car For Highways

  • Top Speed : 224 mph (360 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.0 seconds
  • Car Type : Supercar

This supercar is designed to dominate track racing, and it should appeal to drivers who enjoy the thrill of fast yet precise driving. The car excels at both driving down straight roads at blistering speeds, and cornering with ease.

Although its ability to blaze past other racers and cops is a trait that most drivers would appreciate, the aerodynamics on this machine allows it to stick to the asphalt, ensuring that the player is always in control of the steering. If you're up for a challenge, the Gumpert Apollo S is one of the most rewarding cars to drive in the game.

7 Lamborghini Reventón

Sleek Super Car Inspired By Jet Engine

  • Top Speed : 211 mph (340 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.4 seconds
  • Car Type : Supercar

The striking appearance of the Lamborghini Reventón is inspired by jet engines, and it acts like one when it's on the road. Its angular edges, futuristic design, and pleasurable exhaust note make it one of the coolest cars in the game. It is an excellent driving machine for owning the daunting Hot Pursuit events due to its precise handling and acceleration.

Despite its exceptional handling and acceleration, the incredible top speed that the Reventón delivers can make it an intimidating ride for beginners. But, once players are accustomed to the feel of the car, this machine will never disappoint them.

6 Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster

Fast & Stylish Convertible With Excellent Handling

  • Top Speed : 217 mph (349 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.4 seconds
  • Car Type : Supercar

The Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster is a mastercrafted driving machine, offering a thrilling top-speed experience like no other on this list. This supercar boasts monstrous acceleration and nimble handling even at top speeds.

Whether players are challenging some of the best hyper cars in the game, or simply showing the cops who rules the highways of Seacrest County, this Pagani is a friendly machine worth any player's faith. Fun fact: there are only five of its kind in the world, hence the Cinque.

5 Koenigsegg CCXR Edition

Aerodynamic Hyper Car With Incredible Top Speed

  • Top Speed : 259 mph (417 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 2.8 seconds
  • Car Type : Hypercar

In the real world, the Koenigsegg CCXR Edition is designed to be an eco-friendly car, featuring a flex-fuel engine capable of operating on biofuels. However, in Hot Pursuit Remastered , it's a violent hypercar that boasts unbelievable acceleration and mind-blowing top speeds.

This car is available in the elite events of Seacrest County, where players are pitted against equally challenging hypercars and unforgiving cops equipped with ingenious race-disrupting tech. This Koenigsegg is a car designed for drivers who seek nothing less than ultimate performance.

4 Lamborghini Murciélago LP 670-4 SuperVeloce

High Speed Dominator With Incredible Handling

  • Top Speed : 209 mph (336 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.2 seconds
  • Car Type : Supercar

While this entry may not be the fastest car on this list, it's high up here for entirely different reasons. This Lamborghini trades top speed for unsurpassed handling, making it a king of the road. Its performance becomes evident in the time trial event, the Bull Run. Despite the heavy downpour, the Murciélago LP 670-4 SuperVeloce showcases its ability to stick to asphalt at top speeds.

If there's one car that can be relied upon to dominate all roads in Seacrest County and under all weather conditions, this Lamborghini is any player's go-to pick.

3 McLaren F1

A Legendary Hypercar With Amazing Top Speed & Handling

  • Top Speed : 240 mph (386 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.5 seconds
  • Car Type : Hypercar

The McLaren F1 is a legendary hypercar renowned for its classic design and unparalleled performance on the track. Powered by the monstrous V12 engine, it delivers unadulterated power, propelling the car like the speed demon it's meant to be.

The McLaren F1 is a top choice for several late game Hot Pursuit events, capable of going toe-to-toe against high-performace hypercars like the Bugatti Veyron and Pagani Zonda. For players who wish to drive a historic automotive machine that's capable of dominating modern speed monsters, the McLaren F1 is the ultimate ride.

2 Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport

Convertible Buggatti That Doesn't Sacrifice Performance

  • Top Speed : 253 mph (407 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 2.7 seconds
  • Car Type : Hypercar

The Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport is a luxurious hypercar with a convertible design. Powered by a whopping quad-turbocharged W16 engine, this beast of a machine offers incredible acceleration and is capable of reaching a top speed of whopping 407 km/h.

This Bugatti excels on the straight highways, but its weight makes it a challenge to maneuver sharp turns at high speeds. Drivers that enjoy blazing past the competition on straight roads, or simply want to experience the thrill of top-speed driving, should be satisfied with the Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport.

1 Koenigsegg Agera

The Ultimate Hyper Car For Speed & Performance

  • Top Speed : 242 mph (389 km/h)
  • Acceleration : 0-60 mph in 3.1 seconds
  • Car Type : Hypercar

While slightly slower than the previous entry, the Koenigsegg Agera still takes the top crown for its exceptional handling while moving at top speeds. In the hands of a skilled driver, the Koenigsegg Agera is an intimidating force to be reckoned with.

Mastering the Agera demands discipline and understanding the acceleration curve to capitalize on its ability to reach top speeds quickly. If players wish to experience the pinnacle of hypercar performance in Hot Pursuit Remastered , the Koenigsegg Agera is a no-brainer.

item.title: Marvel Snap Compensating Players in a Big Way After Being Temporarily Unavailable
item.description:
Summary

  • Marvel Snap is compensating US players for downtime with rewards packages.
  • ByteDance-owned Nuverse is the publisher for Marvel Snap, facing US political scrutiny.
  • Marvel Snap aims to prevent further legal disruptions and distance itself from ByteDance in the future.

Marvel Snap is offering compensation rewards to account for its period of unavailability across the United States due to a brief shutdown period earlier this month. While the rewards package offered by Marvel Snap will be available to players across the world, players in the United States will have access to extra rewards.

Nuverse, the publisher for Marvel's PC and mobile-based card battler, is owned by ByteDance, a Chinese-owned company that also owns the video-based social media platform TikTok and has become a focal point in U.S. politics over the past several months. In the spring of 2024, the U.S. Congress approved the Protecting Americans From Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act, which listed ByteDance by name as one of said adversaries. On January 19, the ban on Marvel Snap caused the game to become unavailable to all players in the United States.

However, the action against ByteDance has been temporarily stayed, and as of last week, Marvel Snap has returned to the U.S. market. In a recent Twitter article, developer Second Dinner expressed a need to make amends for the timed rewards, contents, and missions that have been disrupted by the outage. This culminates in all U.S.-based players who had logged in within 30 days of the outage's start date receiving one of two different US Downtime Packages, depending on whether their Collection Level exceeds 500. Rewards for those over 500 include two Spotlight Keys, 4,150 Credits, 6,200 Collector’s Tokens, five Gold Conquest Tickets, three Infinite Conquest Tickets, 4,000 Conquest Medals, and three Cosmic Gold Borders. Under-500 players receive six Mystery Series 3 Cards, 7150 Credits, and three Cosmic Gold Borders. Both versions of this package also contain 1,000 Gold, a Mystery Variant, six Premium Mystery Variants, a Cosmic Red Border, and 155 x5 Random Boosters.

Marvel Snap US Downtime and Global Gratitude Package Contents

For US-based players– US Downtime Package:

Over Collection Level 500

  • 2 Spotlight Keys
  • 5000 Season Pass XP
  • 4150 Credits
  • 6200 Collector’s Tokens
  • 1000 Gold
  • 5 Gold Conquest Ticket
  • 3 Infinite Conquest Ticket
  • 4000 Conquest Medals
  • 1 Mystery Variant
  • 6 Premium Mystery Variants
  • 1 Cosmic Red Border (Super Rare)
  • 3 Cosmic Gold Border (Super Rare)
  • 155 x5 Random Boosters

Under Collection Level 500

  • 6 Mystery Series 3 Cards
  • 5000 Season Pass XP
  • 7150 Credits
  • 1000 Gold
  • 1 Mystery Variant
  • 6 Premium Mystery Variant
  • 1 Cosmic Red Border (Super Rare)
  • 3 Cosmic Gold Border (Super Rare)
  • 155 x5 Random Boosters

For non-US-based players– Global Gratitude Package:

Over Collection Level 500

  • 2 Spotlight Key
  • 3000 Collector’s Tokens
  • 1500 Credits
  • 1 Mystery Variant
  • 1 Premium Mystery Variant
  • 1 Cosmic Gold Border (Super Rare)
  • 1 Cosmic Red Border (Super Rare)
  • 155 x3 Random Boosters

Under Collection Level 500

  • 6 Mystery Series 3 Cards
  • 3000 Credits
  • 1 Mystery Variant
  • 1 Premium Mystery Variant
  • 1 Cosmic Gold Border (Super Rare)
  • 1 Cosmic Red Border (Super Rare)
  • 155 x3 Random Boosters

Players outside the United States are also eligible for rewards under the same Marvel Snap Collection Level and login-period parameters. Those above Collection Level 500 can claim two Spotlight Keys, 3,000 Collector’s Tokens, and 1,500 Credits, while those under Collection Level 500 get six Mystery Series 3 Cards and 3,000 Credits. Both of these packages also contain a Mystery Variant, a Premium Mystery Variant, a Cosmic Gold Border, a Cosmic Red Border, and 155 x3 Random Boosters.

Marvel Snap is also taking steps to ensure that no further legal-based interruptions in service occur. According to the article on Twitter, the development team is working to bring more of its development services in-house and is trying to find a new publisher to distance itself from TikTok's parent company.

item.title: Payday 3 Gets Surprise Collaboration With One of 2012's Best Games
item.description:
Summary

  • Hotline Miami collaboration enhances Payday 3 gameplay with Jacket Character Pack on February 3.
  • There was a previous Hotline Miami collaboration with Payday 2 in 2014.

Starbreeze Studios has announced a surprising collaboration between the 2012 indie game Hotline Miami and Payday 3 . While the two series have collaborated in the past, Hotline Miami hasn't been particularly relevant for a long time, making its inclusion in Payday 3 a pleasant surprise.

Payday 3 has faced an uphill battle ever since its launch. It received an extremely polarizing response upon launch, and didn't feature nearly as much content as its predecessor. Many were left wondering why they'd bother to leave Payday 2 behind at all. For a short time in 2024, Payday 3 clawed its way to "Mostly Positive" Steam reviews, although this has since fallen back to "Mixed." That hasn't stopped Starbreeze Studios from continuing to work on Payday 3 , despite the game failing to meet critical or commercial expectations.

A new trailer released online confirmed that Payday 3 is getting a Hotline Miami collaboration, bringing one of the best indie games of all time to the heist shooter. The pack itself will allow gamers to play as the voiceless protagonist Jacket, and adds several new weapons to the game. One of the new Overkill Weapons is called Sociopath, and looks just like the baseball bat Jacket uses in Hotline Miami . The Jacket Character Pack is set to release for Payday 3 on February 3, coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC versions of the game.

Payday 3 is Getting a Hotline Miami Collaboration on February 3

Curiously, this isn't the first collaboration between the two. A Hotline Miami DLC was also released for Payday 2 back in 2014, although notably, this was when the hype for the original game was still high, and the sequel was still in the works. There hasn't been a Hotline Miami game in almost a decade, and as great as it is, it's undoubtedly less relevant than it was at the time. Therefore, it's pretty surprising to see this collaboration come to life. It's still a welcome surprise - more Hotline Miami is never a bad thing.

It remains to be seen what the future holds for Payday 3 . The franchise still has plenty of name value among gamers, but it has undeniably been hurt by the reaction to Payday 3 . It was announced at the tail end of 2024 that Payday 3 will be getting a lower level of investment moving forward, a worrying sign for fans. While Starbreeze Studios remains confident it can deliver good value to players, it has a very long road ahead if the game is to live up to the legacy of its predecessor.

item.title: Roblox: UGC Limited Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
UGC Limited is one of the few Roblox experiences that is not just a game for your entertainment, but a useful tool for marketing and sharing your creativity. Here, Roblox creators can generate their own codes that other players can redeem to get access to specific, limited-edition items.

We, in turn, have collected some cool UGC Limited codes that you can use to buy new cosmetic items. So, if you want to change your image but want more unique and rare things, this is one of the best options.

Updated January 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: In this guide, you'll find UGC codes to suit different tastes. Be sure to come back to this guide later because we often add new freebies, and ideally it is better to save it so you don't lose access. If you have any difficulties with redeeming codes, you will also find detailed step-by-step instructions on how to redeem them below.

All UGC Limited Codes

Working UGC Limited Codes

  • DRP - Redeem this code to get a Blue Card.
  • TRP - Redeem this code to get a Water Bar.
  • 876 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hood.
  • TOD - Redeem this code to get a Health Bar.
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Head.
  • LKY - Redeem this code to get a Green Sword.
  • R3DD - Redeem this code to get a Red Scythe.
  • NYAW - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hat with Horns
  • 404 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Item
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Hat
  • HDN - Redeem this code to get a Dragon Hat
  • SWD - Redeem this code to get Blue Hood
  • 707 - Redeem this code to get Purple Antlers
  • rainglowb - Redeem this code to get Sapphire War Axe
  • Gel - Redeem this code to get Purple Devil Horns
  • DISCORD.GG/CAC - Redeem this code to get Messy Summer Boy Hair
  • ANOTHERCODEWOOO - Redeem this code to get Messy Y2K
  • THANKYOUGUYS - Redeem this code to get Hair
  • REDVALK - Redeem this code to get Reevalk Decal
  • RAINBOW - Redeem this code to get Rainglowb.
  • SKULL - Redeem this code to get Skull.
  • TRICKORTREAT - Redeem this code to get Trick Or Treat Head.
  • THISISAINFSTOCKJAMCODE - Redeem this code to get Jam Fedora.
  • Headphones - Redeem this code to get Cat Burger Pods.
  • Tie - Redeem this code to get Tie.
  • Hat - Redeem this code to get The Neon Tophat of Doom.
  • Cowboy Hat - Redeem this code to get Max.
  • Roblox - Redeem this code to get Star Shades.
  • Poke - Redeem this code to get Purple Noir Valkyrie.
  • Doom - Redeem this code to get Relaxing Pepper.
  • Love - Redeem this code to get Hammer of Friends.
  • Shock - Redeem this code to get DartSky’s Top Hat.

Expired UGC Limited Codes

Currently, there are no expired UGC Limited codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for UGC Limited

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming UGC Limited codes is not difficult, and it is just one of the few actions you can do here. However, if you encounter any difficulties or something doesn't work properly, follow these instructions to figure out what to do:

  • Launch UGC Limited .
  • Pay attention to the top of the screen. There will be a button that says UGC CODES. Click on it.
  • This will open a new menu. There will be two big buttons. Among them, interact with the second one, which says Redeem Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification “Code successfully redeemed” and the limited UGC will appear on your screen.

How to Get More UGC Limited Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you'll need to follow creators who use UGC Limited as a tool to promote their UGC. Considering that the audience engagement in this experience is quite high, you can easily find a content maker whose stuff you like and get a code, or become a UGC creator yourself and share it with others.
